website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, attractive trellis that's ideal for delicate to fairly heavy plants, though some may find it hard to put together.
pros: Owners rave about its good looks and sturdy build
cons: Challenging and time consuming to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy this is to assemble. This took about a day from start to finish. Take your time and read the directions. Make sure you have your posts and cross pieces in the correct place before you screw attach your pieces. Light enough that one man can lift the finished piece into position. I wanted to block the afternoon sun on my small patio and I think this will work very well. I am going to put jasmine on this trellis which grows quite thick. I love the trellis and the easy care vinyl fits in perfectly with out lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful! I purchased this trellis along with two of the smaller ones and have them staggered and the look is amazing! The packaging was a little rough and I had to re-order and return 2 of them because the top ornamental pieces broke in shipment. Amazon was exceptional (as always) with reshipping and their return policy! I am definitely happy with all 3 trellises. I have mine free standing so my husband poured a small amount of concrete at the base for added support. Definitely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: julie WA state

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with the box end just taped! And missing a cap. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Got it all put together, was easy enough to assemble. Got it installed no problems, looks nice. If I can get a replacement cap easy, then I'll upgrade the review. A cordless driver is highly recommended, none of the screw holes are predrilled, but they are self taping screws, so not hard to install. I used some PVC pipe to make spacers to offset it off the wall and anchored it to the house. The more we look at this, the more we like it! Update: customer service emailed me on a Sunday night and is shipping the cap out! That's good service! Update: zero hassle, had the caps in 3 days! Wish all amazon sellers were this good!
customer_reviews.author: JM&JG

customer_reviews.title: I love my trellis!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in record time and was packed very well. This is big and sturdy, just as I expected and hoped. The instructions are very easy to follow. I put most of it together myself, but had to call a handyman to finish it because many of the formed holes were very tight to almost impossible to push the rails through. I used a dremel sanding cone to enlarge them and that helped. The big man with the mallet helped the most, though. A woman alone would have been able to build this trellis IF the holes had all been drilled better. That said I suggest two people, and a mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because the product description said it could ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the product description said it could be mounted free standing. It can, however the material this is made of is very light guage which makes it comparatively light and insubstantial. So if you plan to mount this free standing as I did I suggest you plan to add additional support at least to the bottom 3 feet. I used flat steel stock 1/8 thick 3 inches wide and thru bolted them Basically I sandwiched the plastic between the steel stock. Painted it white and now at least it wont blow over the first time the wind blows.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cost about $30 more at local big box store. I assembled by myself, but would have been easier with a helper. I used heavy duty angle aluminum and drove them into ground to support freed standing trellis. I pulled the sides apart at the bottom to slide the angle aluminum into the posts and then pushed sides back together and secured with a screw through the plastic post into the aluminum angle. Has withstood 40 mph winds.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part!
customer_reviews.text: The arbor is sturdy and would look great except it came missing a cap at the top. Company did not respond to phone call and it looks terrible with the missing piece. Going to try calling again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Takes 2 people to put togther
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cover unused garage window directly on front entry. We did add one eye bolt w/ a small zip tie at top to stabilize in case of hurricanes. Used cement in most of hole . The planter is also held on w/ 3 zip ties so we can take down in a hurry if nec.. Fern is artificial w/ Fairy lights intertwined.( both from Amazon). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kingel

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, but guess I should have checked out dimensions ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, but guess I should have checked out dimensions better. This is quite large, and not so easy to put together....although extremely durable. I guess I should have purchased something a bit smaller. We put this against an exterior brick chimney. It is very strong and attractive, and next year I will have to plant something that will really grow fast to cover more of the arbor area. The price was terrific, and it arrived very timely as promised. Gave it 4 stars because it really takes 2 people to put this together, and is a bit more difficult to assemble than we thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgegirl

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute nightmare to assemble!! Nightmare. It seems like it should be so easy, and yet I wanted to throw the whole product in the trash halfway through. The holes for each rod are too small, so the rods won’t thread through them. I had to use a knife to cut the holes bigger in order to even get the rods through. As your assembling one part, another part comes undone, so now you have to try and thread the rods back into place. I’ve had it half-assembled in my garage for a week now, because I have no interest in dealing with it anymore. It’s not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Needs Two People to assemble.  missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the premade holes were too small and needed scraping to get the poles in. That dramatically increased assembly time. No screws or instructions in the box. Once together it looks good but I doubt it will stand up against a strong wind. if you have it against a wall, it should be fine. Sorta worth it for 120bucks but not worth more than that.
customer_reviews.author: techmannn

customer_reviews.title: classic Trellis
customer_reviews.text: We love our trellis, great detail and construction. My wife had to help me put top rail on it was very tight. Other than that it was easy and fast to assemble. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to assemblr
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but after 2hours still have been an able to get the second side of the arch into the side. The hole, as noted in a previous review, is too small. That reviewer enlarged the hole with a dremiel so I will now purchase a dremel In an attempt to finish assembly. Additionally, be aware it will require a drill to complete assembly as there are no pre-drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far with the trellis. Only time will tell if it lasts or not. Husband put it together, and said it was a bit time consuming, and had to trim some of the holes the bars go into for them to fit. We like it enough that we're talking about buying 2 more for other spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O.

customer_reviews.title: writing titles is the hardest part of a review
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I plan on ordering more once the pandemic eases up, so like, 2030. Kinda iffy to try to assemble. Use a rubber hammer to try to get it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: TitleWriter

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality made product. Easy to put together. Actually with so much junk coming from China where the instructions are vague and screws don't fit, this Canadian made trellis surprised me. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out beautifully!! Excellent seller and fast shipping too! (You will want to make sure that you screw it into the home so that it holds up well; it is very well built, and we've received numerous compliments!)
customer_reviews.author: L.N.H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. Assembly was straightforward. I recently purchased my fourth trellis from NE Arbors. The prior three trellis have been in place for two years and still look new. The fourth trellis arrived in a damaged box and the two caps were missing. I called NE Arbors and they were "first class" in how they handled it. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I envisioned when I purchased it!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful where I put it and will especially look the part when I get the climbing flowering vines to grow up the trellis! I placed it there to cover our barbeque pit and trashcans and it will be great when it's finished.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Russell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful trellis
customer_reviews.text: We are finally finished putting it together. Make sure you measure the upright slats. We had to cut several about an inch for them to match the specifications listed in the directions. Do that first, it will make putting it together much easier.
customer_reviews.author: P Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Sturdy, fit well together during assembly and impressive when upright. Anchors are 21” which gives it solid platform to remain upright. Like it so much we just ordered their walk through trellis for thr end of our garden. Terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Missing one Finial.
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled and it took approximately 20 minutes however I am missing one finiel shown in picture. I do not know if this message will solve the problem but I hope it will. I will await your responce, thanks Everett James
customer_reviews.author: Rett

customer_reviews.title: This is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice trellis and very sturdy, however it is huge. I guess I didnt realize how big this was. We had to dig a couple inches in the ground for it to fit under the gutters and lean against the house.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest gal

customer_reviews.title: I am missing a part.
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to return this item, but would like to get a replacement for the missing part. One of the end caps was not in the packaging. The end of the box was partially open, and I suspect that it fell out. If you could help me out with this, it would be gratefully appreciated and much easier than returning. Thank. Lola Boor 920 730 1873 Strstrkdnz@aol.com.
customer_reviews.author: starstuck dance team camps

customer_reviews.title: Best large trellis for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best large trellis for the money. Very solid and its construction allows for wind proof anchoring. There are also some good construction and installation tips in the reviews. I used some cut down 2x4s for the base and attached the trellis to stone columns for lateral support. Looks great and my star jasmines are looking good on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Tedious assembly
customer_reviews.text: When finished, it is beautiful. Assembly is tedious however as the slots for the rails are very tight and require a lot of finesse to get them through. It’s an two person job to assemble. Also, one of the two caps cracked when placed on the side rail as shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great trellis
customer_reviews.text: Love this trellis. Easy to put up and is beautiful. Thinking of buying another one!!
customer_reviews.author: tooney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these and they are really nice. Easy to assemble and great value.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: glad it's so big
customer_reviews.text: I want to provide a climbing surface for my trumpet vine. I think it will do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ms kitty

customer_reviews.title: It's holding up great and has a rather large clematis growing up it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for mother's day last year!! It's holding up great and has a rather large clematis growing up it. The clematis is about 6 years old so it has some heft to it!! Looks great and was very easy for my husband to put up....bought another one because this one was so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is well constructed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: one of the cross bars had milling marks on it and that ended up on the site surface of the trellis once I completed installation and it couldn't be changed. Other than that it is well constructed and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this beautiful trellis
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to assemble, I did it by myself (62 yr female). But my husband helped me dig the holes for installation. I put a brace on the backside for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: K.Vandecar

customer_reviews.title: Nice arbor
customer_reviews.text: We really like this arbor. Looks great against our shed.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: If you read the directions first it goes together well. Came without one cap. I contacted the company directly and they sent me one free in two days! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  I may buy another for a different side of my house.
customer_reviews.text: Great trellis! I planted 2 climbing roses on this wide trellis. Very sturdy with think vinyl construction screwed together from the back. I did reinforce the bottom legs with a pressure treated 2x4 that had to be cut to make it extra secure in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C Houseknecht

customer_reviews.title: Charming Trellis
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am using it to grow ivy on as a privacy wall. I bought two. I paid a man to install them so that they are free standing. He dug down 36 inches and poured concrete. I put 36 inch 2x4’s into the bottom of the trellises to support in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this together easily. One cap was lost in transit but company replaced it. No apology, but it did come. Trellis looks great and we are happy with it. It seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great quality. I put this together myself easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: G S

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Trellis!
customer_reviews.text: We received this within a few days - ahead of schedule. It was very easy to put together - it did help that we had 2 of us. The box was missing the end caps but with a quick call to New England Arbors they are on their way to us. The instructions only indicate putting in a few screws but the package contains a lot more - recommend using all the screws you can so it all stays together. Looks great in our front yard!
customer_reviews.author: David Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This trellis is perfect! I looked at local facilities and they wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: This trellis is perfect! I looked at local facilities and they wanted 10x the price for minimal differences. Definitely the best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing
customer_reviews.text: First box arrived damaged but replacement was shipped out the next day and arrived safely. Allow at least 1 hour for assembly, it goes together rather easily but aligning all the pieces was the most challenging part because of the overall size. I would definitely purchase again !
customer_reviews.author: Anthony SC

customer_reviews.title: Classic styling true quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and classic styling make this a winner. Assemble on the ground exactly per direction - can be cut down for less height. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and was simple to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Camp

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Trellis and well made.
customer_reviews.text: The PVC parts are of high quality and machined well. It took me around 30 minutes to assemble, but would have been quicker with another set of hands. I do suggest that you follow the instructions and lay down sheets of cardboard or other material to protect the PVC from being scratched, and have at least a 4 x 8 foot work area. The only negative comment is the instructions saying to 'sleeve' a 2x4 into the vertical posts for a more secure ground installation. The width of a 2x4 is approximately 1/4 inch too wide to fit inside the posts, so you need to trim the section of the 2x4 to fit inside the vertical PVC posts.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy, or ours was warped and almost impossible to snap in....i would have purchased something already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!!!! Took about 20 minutes to put together and another 10 to stake it in the ground but worth it. Had morning glories climbing it in the summer and now it has a nice fall wreath hanging on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy trellis
customer_reviews.text: Best I you have help to assemble very large and cane awkward while assembling. It seems like there is away a wind where I live and I have no problems with it falling over
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DeMeio

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful big trellis.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and built to last. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Is a beautiful trellis. It is not terribly difficult to assemble but has a few tricks that would make it easier. HOWEVER, it didn’t have any instructions in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but didn’t fit together
customer_reviews.text: The thing was machined wrong. Would have had to break some pieces to get them to fit. Couldn’t get it done so had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with missing parts and no assembly instructions. Looks like I was sent a previously opened box.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice arbor
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble and the quality seems to be very good. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful free standing witth Honeysuckle or Climbers.
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to evaluate but looks gorgeous and the Major Wheeler Honeysuckle loves it. The hummingbirds zoom there every day and it is gorgeous to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Twila Paradis

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to assemble this arbor, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to assemble this arbor, but it arrived with portions of it hanging out of the opened end of the box. If all the parts are there and nothing is broken it will be a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Looks Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Its a little annoying to assemble because the vinyl planks buckle against each other but with a little effort anyone can put this thing together. After installation I've received dozens of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L Henley

customer_reviews.title: Unable to assemble and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: It came with no instructions and missing an end cap for one of the posts. I have no idea how to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence LeSage

customer_reviews.title: The item is fine, it s the assembly that is a mess
customer_reviews.text: The item is fine, it s the assembly that is a mess. Not easy to put together for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Moser

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: There were no screws in the package we received in the mail. Please advise how we can get the screws?!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Trellises
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, look great on the side of our house. We put 3 together with the middle one higher and trimmed the one side of the cap on each side of the arbors touching the middle arbor so they fit together snugly.
customer_reviews.author: kim brinn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice trellis
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a tall/wide trellis and this one fits the bill. I am very pleased with it and would even consider purchasing a second one. Wonderfull for long vine plants like trumpet vine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Colaizzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it easy to put together much stronger than i though
customer_reviews.author: james stump

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinarily difficult to assemble. But very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinarily difficult to assemble - slots are exactly same size as the boards so they do not slide through. You need a large heavy mallet and an2x4 to assemble. On the plus size - extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this trellis very large is nice for filling in large empty walls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very elegant
customer_reviews.text: the arbor is very lovely. Very well made and easy to install. We have english ivy growing on it and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: It's made of quality materials however, it was very ...
customer_reviews.text: It's made of quality materials however, it was very difficult to put together. The posts they used to form the lattice had square corners and the slots had rounded corners. I had to shave each end of the posts to slide them through the openings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hickey

customer_reviews.title: They look very nice in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4. They look very nice in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tall Privacy Trellis!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful arbor. Very tall so it is very good the posts go into the ground a few feet. We filled the posts with cement but would still be able to move the arbor if we ever chose to. We love the style!
customer_reviews.author: Daizy58

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it was easy to assemble and it looks very nice. It was the perfect size for our needs and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Baronowsky

customer_reviews.title: Love this trellis!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty trellis. My friend and I assembled it in less than 2 hours. One of the caps was missing, but after a phone call a new one was shipped immediately. It looks great against my house...have had many complements. I would highly recommend the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with sturdy quality. Easy to assemble with two people. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, soon to be covered with vines, giving us the privacy we sought. Came in good condition. Easily assembled, but should lay out pieces in correct order first. Very pleased and would recommend to anyone wanting a sturdy, tall trellis.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The large size is especially helpful for filling in my space. There was also some cost to assemble and install. Was hoping to find a bonnet top design but this comes close.
customer_reviews.author: F. W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Trellis!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made! I highly recommend this trellis!
customer_reviews.author: Royal Mom 3B

customer_reviews.title: Flattened by the wind after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trellis 3 years ago and were quite happy with it. However, yesterday we found our free-standing trellis apparently flattened by the high (50 mph) wind gusts of the preceding day. Both posts failed at the cross-section weakened by the cutout for the bottom cross-member. Buyers should be aware that the 20 year warranty does not cover wind-related damage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Beer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these in order to further conceal the neighbor's yard. We have vines growing through them. They are sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LF

product_meta.title: Grande 54"W x 90"H Vinyl Trellis
product_meta.description: A substantial trellis to grow a wall of flowers. The Grande Trellis is attractively designed with architectural details, oversized and strong; perfect for training climbing plants – and sturdy enough for your vegetable garden, providing privacy and beautifying less attractive areas. The Grande trellis is attractively designed and maintenance free, because we want you to spend your time enjoying our products, not maintaining them. The Grande trellis is easy to assemble, features a long warranty (20 years.) – and if you need something, were here for you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
